name: search_emails
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool email_search.
Tool description: Simple and Powerful web search for emails - get emails found on the web for a given query and an email domain in real-time.
API description: Search the web for emails using a query and email domain and get up to 5,000 email addresses.

email_domain.description: Email domain - typically a company domain (e.g. wsgr.com) or an email provider domain (e.g. gmail.com).

query.description:
Search query.

`e.g.` *`steve smith san francisco ca usa`*
`e.g.` *`facebook ceo`*
`e.g.` *`jack blogger new york`*
`e.g.` *`car dealer california usa`*

limit.description: The maximum number of emails to return. Defaults to 100. Accepts values from 1 to 5000.
